topSection.paragraph: World's leading all-in-one software for Restaurants.

paragraph.end: . You can easily add and remove any of our services at any point, ensuring we are tailored to your growth.

services.more: We centralize all your services into a single dashboard

visibility.paragraph: Marketing is easier than ever with Foodetective. Capture all guest visit details, notes, tags, and display your services into a unified profile available on all formats for targeted marketing and world-class eaters.

analytics.paragraph: Know how your business is doing anywhere, any time, in real-time. Be notified when important events happen. Enforce industry best practices in every service experience to improve outcomes

bookings.paragraph: Foodetective helps you take control of your business by offering fully customizable reservations for everyday tables, special tastings, and everything in between.

deliveryAndTakeaway.paragraph: Manage all your online deliveries and take-away order from one single platform. Offer your clients a higher quality, the best service, hot meals and manage all of your orders easily.

cateringAndPrivatization.paragraph: Receive Special Requests Manage your catering & privatisations requests like never before, send offers, change menus, assign people to offer your client the best and easiest experience ever.

reviews.paragraph: At Foodetective all reviews are made by professionals who provide outstanding content creating constructive feedback to help businesses to constantly improve their offer, products & services.

payments.paragraph: Receive payments instantly, connect your bank account and manage your payments from a single view.

list.quote: Revolutionary! Easy to set up, to use and manage. The entire team loves it because of its simplicity and unique interface. We highly recommend it to any F&B business!
We’ve seen an improvement in efficiency within every department of our company. We’ve been able to take more steps toward being paperless using Foodetective.
Foodetective helped us increase our online visibility, to analyze our entire online offer as well as provide our clients unique services that we’ve integrated into our website.

widget.paragraph: Offer clients a world class experience, additional interactions & services. Integrate all kind of services into your website easily with our widget.
